title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
**Elevate Your Comfort at Work and Beyond with BlissTrends Foot Rest!**

Transform your workspace and travel experience with the BlissTrends Foot Rest, meticulously designed to provide unparalleled comfort and support wherever you go. Say goodbye to backaches, lumbar strain, and knee pain with this versatile footrest that caters to your every need, be it in the car, at home, or during long flights.

**Key Features:**

- **Premium Quality Material:** Crafted with high-density foam and encased in a durable fabric cover, this footrest is built to last while ensuring your utmost comfort.
- **Sleek Black Design:** The elegant black color complements any setting, whether it's your office space or living room, adding a touch of sophistication to your comfort.
- **Customizable Comfort:** With two adjustable heights, thanks to the innovative magic tapes and zipper system, you can tailor the footrest to your personal preference for maximum relief.
- **Versatile Usage:** Not just for under the desk! Use it behind your knees or as an airplane footrest to enhance your comfort during any sitting situation.
- **Ergonomic Benefits:** The ergonomic design promotes proper sitting posture, supporting your back, lumbar, and knees, and preventing the discomfort that comes from prolonged sitting.
- **Easy Maintenance:** The removable cover with a convenient zipper makes cleaning a breeze. Just unzip, toss it in the washing machine, and it's good as new.
- **Non-Slip Stability:** No more slipping or sliding! The non-slip bottom design keeps the footrest securely in place, providing steady support no matter how you use it.

**Product Dimensions:**

- Lower Layer: 16.9" (L) x 11.2" (W) x 2.0" (H)
- Upper Layer Thickness: 3.7"

Whether you're working long hours at the desk or embarking on your next travel adventure, the BlissTrends Foot Rest is your ideal companion for comfort and relief. Don't settle for less when it comes to your wellbeing. Order your BlissTrends Foot Rest today and step into a world of comfort!

Transform your workspace into an oasis of comfort with the BlissTrends Foot Rest! Designed with your well-being in mind, this versatile foot stool is the ultimate companion for anyone looking to alleviate back, lumbar, and knee pain while working, driving, or relaxing at home.

- **Ergonomically Designed:** With an ergonomic shape that fits the natural arch of your feet, this footrest encourages proper sitting posture, supporting your legs and back, reducing discomfort, and promoting overall wellness.

- **Adjustable for Customized Support:** Thanks to its ingenious design featuring magic tapes and a zipper, you can easily adjust the height of the footrest to two different positions. Whether you need a lower elevation at 2.0 inches or a higher lift at 3.7 inches, BlissTrends has you covered.

- **Non-Slip Bottom:** Keep your footrest firmly in place with its non-slip design, ensuring stable support throughout your workday or while traveling.

- **Machine Washable Cover:** Life gets messy, but your footrest doesn't have to stay that way. The zippered cover is easily removable and machine washable, making maintenance a breeze.

- **Versatile Use:** Not just for the office, this footrest's multi-functional design allows it to be used as an under-the-desk footrest, behind-the-knee support, or even as an airplane footrest, providing comfort wherever you go.

- **Dimensions:** With a base layer measuring 16.9 inches in length and 11.2 inches in width, and an upper layer thickness of 3.7 inches, the BlissTrends Foot Rest fits neatly under most desks and can be easily transported.
